a great game that i first played in 2002 and was finally able to finish in 2025  its a crunchy combat heavy rpg that rewards planning and exploration  there are elements that i would find hard to complete without a guide ie certain keyword prompts but those moments are few and far between   it was a great time and i would like to make time for it in the future and try a totally different party composition

this was the game i was playing when i moved to college 21 years ago i arrived in my dorm room and set up my computer and was so stressed i just needed to play my game and chill before i got out to meet people  playing it again now it still holds up remarkably well considering its place in the infancy of 3d rpgs it is a colourful and warm game and i will always love the magic system that encourages you to throw everything youve got at the enemies to keep training those magic skills
this game is amazing i went in fairly blind and became obsessed i suggest reading a bit of the classrace combos the community has written to have an easier beginning also bards are insane
